description: HorizontalPodAutoscalerCondition describes the state of a HorizontalPodAutoscaler at a certain point.

lastTransitionTime.description: Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many of the factory methods that the time package offers.

message.description: message is a human-readable explanation containing details about the transition

reason.description: reason is the reason for the condition's last transition.

status.description: status is the status of the condition (True, False, Unknown)
